description:
This module provides students with the frameworks, research and case studies to develop and execute marketing strategies that integrate social purpose (environmental and social responsibility) and are better aligned with the organization’s values and purpose. Increasingly, companies are required to embrace higher ESG standards. Marketing plays a key role in accelerating 
the organization’s purpose-led transformation which enables it to deliver value to multiple stakeholders. There is growing evidence that companies which pursue social purpose marketing can better differentiate themselves from the competition and achieve profitable and sustainable growth. Purpose-led brands benefit from price leadership, stronger brand equity, advocacy and loyalty.
title: Social Purpose Marketing
